# Ruby Clever Pastie

This application is meant as a new kind of public/private paste service. It comes as a very small cost and has no external dependency in terms of db storage.

It cas be tested and used freely at [uu.zoy.org](http://uu.zoy.org)

# Todo

- Auto-pigment code based on its syntax
- AES encrypt on the client side and send encrypted value only
- Use #anchor to decrypt
- install libicu-dev is required for some gem to work correctly.
